channel.title: CVE Feed for Microsoft Corporation -- Named Pipe File System
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Microsoft Corporation -- Named Pipe File System

item.title: CVE-2018-0823|2024-08-05T03:35:49.521Z -- microsoft%20corporation -- named%20pipe%20file%20system
item.description: The Named Pipe File System in Windows 10 version 1709 and Windows Server, version 1709 allows an elevation of privilege vulnerability due to the way the Named Pipe File System handles objects, aka "Named Pipe File System Elevation of Privilege Vulnerability".
